section.name: Elektra Nemora
section.p: Elektra always has a sweet song on her lips to charm the people she meets. She believes all conflict is best settled by compromise, an attitude that makes her a natural diplomat and peacekeeper. As well as helping to calm the tense military situation in Akatsurai, she would like to play music at the court of the sovereign - a signal honour for a travelling minstrel.
You can play as Elektra, or as a troubadour with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
